009package Ch25_SiftFeatures;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.sift.scalespace.DogScaleSpace;
016import imagingbook.common.sift.scalespace.GaussianScaleSpace;
017
018/**
019 * Builds a hierarchical Difference-of-Gaussian scale space representation 
020 * from the input image and displays all scale levels.
021 * To create a linear scale space (without decimation) set 'P' = 1 and 
022 * 'topLevel' to an arbitrary value.
023 * Consult the book for additional details.
024 */
025
026public class Show_DogScaleSpace implements PlugInFilter {
027        
028        static double sigma_0 = 1.6;    // initial scale level
029        static double sigma_s = 0.5;    // original image (sampling) scale
030        
031        static int Q = 3;       // scale steps per octave
032        static int P = 4;       // number of octaves
033        static int botLevel = 0;        // index q of bottom level in each octave
034        static int topLevel = Q;        // index q of top level in each octave
035
036        @Override
037        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus arg1) {
038                return DOES_8G + DOES_32 + NO_CHANGES;
039        }
040        
041        @Override
042        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
043                FloatProcessor fp = (FloatProcessor) ip.convertToFloat();
044                GaussianScaleSpace gss =
045                        new GaussianScaleSpace(fp, sigma_s, sigma_0, P, Q, botLevel, topLevel);
046                DogScaleSpace dss = new DogScaleSpace(gss);
047                dss.show("DoG");
048        }
049
050}
